checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/url-shortener-frontend' should be added.

Capability "CAP_CHOWN" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/url-shortener-frontend.allow-capability-cap-chown: SomeReason'.

Capability "CAP_SETGID" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/url-shortener-frontend.allow-capability-cap-setgid: SomeReason'.

Capability "CAP_SETUID" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/url-shortener-frontend.allow-capability-cap-setuid: SomeReason'.
runAsNonRoot should be set to true or runAsUser should be set to a value > 0 either in the container SecurityContext or PodSecurityContext.
readOnlyRootFilesystem is not set in container SecurityContext. It should be set to 'true'.
Pod Seccomp profile is missing. Seccomp profile should be added to the pod SecurityContext.
